description.zh: 可以自定义回到顶部按钮的样式，限制宽高：`40px * 40px`。
description.en: You can customize the style of the button, just note the size limit: no more than `40px * 40px`.

description.zh: 可以自定义监听滚动目标元素。
description.en: You can customize the listening scroll target element.

node.html:
The distance to the bottom is set to 50px by default, which is overridable.

If you decide to use custom styles, please note the size limit: no more than 40px * 40px.

Property Description Type Default
target specifies the scrollable area dom node () => HTMLElement () => window
visibilityHeight the BackTop button will not show until the scroll height reaches this value number 400
onClick a callback function, which can be executed when you click the button Function -

Q&A

Why doesn't using BackTop in my project take effect?

Reason
  1. The target in the BackTop has a default value of window, which is fixed in most cases in a project and does not scroll, so it does not take effect.
  2. The visibilityHeight in the BackTop has a default value of 400, and BackTop does not take effect when the scroll height is not reached.
Solution

Set the target of the BackTop as a valid scrolling container and set the value of the visibilityHeight property to a valid value, as is the case.

details.

pageContext.description:
Tips

When you specify backTop's target (non-window), you get a value that may be null or undefined, at which point place the BackTop behind the specified scroll container, and make sure that the effective scroll container is loaded when the target is obtained. This issue will be fixed in a later release.

BackTop makes it easy to go back to the top of the page.

When To Use

  • When the page content is very long.
  • When you need to go back to the top very frequently in order to view the contents.
